list.name: Container end events
list.query: event_type:STATE_EVENT AND state:END AND application_id:$application_id AND container_id:$container_id AND framework:$framework AND component:$component

panels.content:
Below graphs are displayed per pid as some jobs are running multiple JVM inside the same container

You can use the pid variable to display metrics for only one JVM
